stop() - 类 中的方法app_kvEcs.ECS
Stops the service; all participating KVServers are stopped for processing client requests but the processes remain running.
stop() - 类 中的方法app_kvServer.Listen
Stops the KVServer, all client requests are rejected and only ECS requests are processed.
